solution_line_template: On the first day, Alina sent {lucia_messages_day1} - {alina_fewer_messages} = <<{lucia_messages_day1}-{alina_fewer_messages}={alina_messages_day1}>>{alina_messages_day1} messages.
The total number for the first day is {alina_messages_day1}+{lucia_messages_day1} = <<{alina_messages_day1}+{lucia_messages_day1}={total_messages_day1}>>{total_messages_day1} messages.
On the second day, Lucia sent {lucia_fraction_day2} *{lucia_messages_day1} = <<{lucia_fraction_day2}*{lucia_messages_day1}={lucia_messages_day2}>>{lucia_messages_day2} messages.
Alina sent {alina_messages_day1}*{alina_multiplier_day2} = <<{alina_messages_day1}*{alina_multiplier_day2}={alina_messages_day2}>>{alina_messages_day2} messages on the second day.
The total for the second day is {lucia_messages_day2}+{alina_messages_day2} = <<{lucia_messages_day2}+{alina_messages_day2}={total_messages_day2}>>{total_messages_day2} messages.

For the three days, they sent {total_messages_day1}+{total_messages_day3}+{total_messages_day2} = <<{total_messages_day1}+{total_messages_day3}+{total_messages_day2}={total_messages_three_days}>>{total_messages_three_days} messages.
